v0.1.1.description: - Fix Regions when check by difficulty are active
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

v0.1.3.description: - Change menu detection by only detecting if the game is not in a stage
v0.1.3.title: v0.1.3

v0.1.4.description:
- Add GuardRail and better error messages
- Fix client bug when the extra stage is cleared
v0.1.4.title: v0.1.4

v0.2.0.description:
- Add option that allow the stages to be unlock progressively or not
- Add option that set if characters have access to both stage 4 or only the one that they have normally
- Add Eirin as a functional goal
- Fix padding on the fps text not being set to a space character
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description: - Fix Stage 6B not being unlocked by the client in non progressive stage unlock
v0.2.1.title: v0.2.1

v0.2.2.description:
- Fix generation failure on non progressive stage and global stage unlock
- Fix and made playable Normal mode (force one stage 4 and make the choice between both stage 6 appear)
v0.2.2.title: v0.2.2

v0.2.3.description: - Fix crash when using a continue in normal mode
v0.2.3.title: v0.2.3

v0.3.0.description:
- Add an option to add Last Word/Time Goal check for stages where the time goal is above 0 (stages 1 to 5)
- Add an option to randomized the ability to gain time
- Add filler item "+10 Time" and "+50 Time"
- Add useful item "+1000 Time" (x10)
- Add trap 'Reverse Human/Youkai Gauge', which make the playing the human make the gauge go toward the youkai side (and the other way around for youkai) but does not reverse the benefit from it
- Add trap 'Extend Time Goal' which add 25% to the total amount of time needed for triggering the Last Word
- Every traps that can only be applied once per stage are not queued more than once anymore
- Fix a client crash during Kaguya's Last Word
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.4.0.description:
- Option added: DeathLink Amnesty
- Option added: LimitLives and LimitBombs, that limit the maximum number of resource that can be given by the client (Client side change only)
- Commands added to the client that allow some options to be changed: DeathLink, DeathLink Amnesty, RingLink and LimitLives/LimitBombs
v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
- Change "Last Word" location name to "Last Spell"
- Remove Last Spell location in Easy dfficulty
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

v0.5.0.description:
- New mode: Spell Practice, where each spell card is a location. Can be combined with Practice/Normal mode
- New Goal (For Spell Practice): Kaguya's Treasure, find all 5 treasures then complete the final spell card to complete the game
- New Options associated with Spell Practice: Starting Spell Card, Max Spell Card, Filter Spell Card by difficulty or stage and possiblity to have duplicate spell card item
- New Option for the goal Kaguya's Treasure: Where the treasure can be located and which spell card is the final one
- New Command on the client: /treasures, to see how many treasures are collected and what is the final spell card
- Some Options description updated to be more detailed

- Fix the splashscreen of having unlocked the Extra stage from appearing, there should have less crash when returning to the menu
- New item group created for the characters with shorter name (Ex: "Illusion Team", "Magic Team",...)

Issues:
- In Spell Practice, sending Death Link doesn't work, only receiving work
- When playing in vanilla, the name of the spell card just unlocked will not appear, they will appear after a reload of the menu
v0.5.0.title: v0.5.0

v0.5.1.description:
- Fix Spell Cards of the Extra stage from being excluded at all time
- Fix Treasure locations when they are on Kaguya, they were only allowed on the second half of her spell cards
v0.5.1.title: v0.5.1

v0.5.2.description:
- Fix Extra stage items from being included in Spell Practice mode
- Fix Spell Cards access rules of the Extra stage from being the same as the Extra Stage
v0.5.2.title: v0.5.2

v1.0.0.description:
- New goal: Capture Spell Cards, with options to choose how many and on which stage.
- Solo Character added. Due to how they work, if they are enabled, you will start with all of them and the extra stage is forced to "apart" with one item for all of them.
- New Option: Choose the number of team enabled in Spell Practice
- Difficulty check has been modified, 'difficulty_to_lower' has been made into it's own option (Can now be change on the client after generation)
- New Option: DeathLink Trigger can now be change (Game Over or Life)
- GuardRail updated: Less likely to throw false positive
- Some generation fixes
- Alias for spellcards following the format "SCXXX" for easier hinting
- Manifest added
v1.0.0.title: v1.0.0

v1.0.1.description:
- Fix treasure spell card goal not being unlocked after a restart of the client
- Fix /treasures throwing an error
- Fix some option description
v1.0.1.title: v1.0.1

v1.1.0.description:
* New Options: Added the ability to exclude spellcards and to include spellcards (ignoring stage/difficulty filters)
* Spell Cards not unlocked but cleared on the score.dat should not be sent anymore and should be reset correctly
* Changed how the client detect if the player is in spell practice. Boss defeat shouldn't be sent anymore when finishing a spellcard
* Fix spellcard #217 name
* Fix a bug where bombs would be regiven when the player death-bomb with their last bomb
* Fix stage unlock for solo characters
* Fix score display for Yuyuko and when Time check are enabled
* Fix client crash when a solo character get an ending
* The client should now reset fully and properly when disconnecting from the server
* The client shouldn't need to be restarted when the game crash. Relaunching the game should be enough now.
* The client no longer crash when trying to exit it before establishing any connection to a server
* Fix goal with "all_character" when only teams or solo character are active
* Probably others miscellaneous fixes
v1.1.0.title: v1.1.0

v1.1.1.description:
- Fix final spellcard from the treasure goal from not sending it's check
- Fix spellcard access if a collect happened to their location
- The client now wait 1 second after sending a deathlink
v1.1.1.title: v1.1.1
